name: Core Java
desc: A fundamental programming language that builds strong object-oriented skills, essential for mastering advanced Java technologies like Java EE and Android development.

name: Kotlin
desc: A modern, expressive programming language that simplifies Android development and enhances Java interoperability, paving the way for more efficient and safe coding practices.

name: Android
desc: Creating mobile applications for the Android platform, utilizing Java or Kotlin to build user-friendly and feature-rich experiences across diverse devices.

name: Python
desc: A versatile language that simplifies web development and data analysis, paving the way for machine learning and AI.

name: SAP UI5
desc: A user-friendly framework for building responsive web applications, essential for developing enterprise solutions and enhancing user experience in SAP environments.
